test_message: Check donation DON-2024-001 submitted 12 minutes ago with no claims. Current radius was 5km. Expand search to 10km radius and identify 3 new NGOs to contact. If past expiry time, mark as failed match.
expected_purpose: Monitors unclaimed donations and expands search radius

donations_escalated.reason: Unclaimed for 12 minutes; escalation threshold exceeded, expanding search radius to 10km and triggering new broadcast.
